article.title: Boeing Awarded C-17A Radome Contract
article.text: Boeing – Defense Space & Security, Huntington Beach, California, was awarded an $18,405,995 firm-fixed-price contract with options for DO-160G Tri-band radomes and mounting rings, and installation and integration on C-17A aircraft. One bid was solicited with one received. Work will be performed in Huntington Beach, California, with an estimated completion date of September 30, 2017. Fiscal 2015 other procurement (Army) funds in the amount of $18,405,995 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Natick, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity (W911QY-16-C-0020).
